name: Fish Outta Water!
description:
Fish Outta Water! is a game made in Unity for the SEAJAM - #TeamSeas Game Jam - itch.io hosted by PolyMars - itch.io.  

It's a simple side-scroller, similar to Flappy Bird.  

Use space to swim.

                 

The #SEAJAM is a game jam made to encourage more people to donate to #TeamSeas, an ocean cleanup project organized by MrBeast and Mark Rober to raise  30, 000, 000$ to get 30, 000, 000 lb out of the ocean.
